title: 3 BR APT for lease
posting_body: For Lease large 3 BR unit in a 3 story house, sunny, remodeled , new kitchen, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances,
large living room and formal dining room, 2 porches, washer and dryer in the basement, walking to Forest Hills station and Arboretum, asking 2800 $/mo  first, last and deposit available 9/1/22.
Ideal for 3 professional roommates  , to qualify you will need a credit report with a score of 670 or higher, and proof of employment with a salary of 5200/mo .
Showing on Saturdays , please call 781-752-7318 for appointment.
